remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SetName%2A> provides an indirect reference to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ActivityCodeDomSerializationManager.SerializationManager%2A> method of the same name.
An exception is thrown if you try to rename an existing object or if you try to give a new object a name that is already taken. In addition, an exception is thrown if you do not pass in an existing object to the method.
